note.snippet: Mālutā ca na vāyanti, kālo cevettha mehiti
Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, ekāsanassidaṃ phalaṃ

note.original: aññā mameva nhāpenti, aññā bhojenti bhojanaṃ; aññā maṃ alaṅkaronti, aññā ramenti maṃ saddhā; (syā.)

alternatives.alternative: aññā mameva nhāpenti, aññā bhojenti bhojanaṃ; aññā maṃ alaṅkaronti, aññā ramenti maṃ saddhā;

note.snippet: Tatra ce atthi dunnītaṃ, taṃ khamassu khamādhipa
Te disvāna ahaṃ tuṭṭhā, saha sabbāhi itthibhi

note.original: neke sahassike mune (syā.), dānaṃ sahassikaṃ mune (pī.)
parisāhi catūhi so (sī.), parisāhi catasso hi (pī.)

note.snippet: Dhammā ceva sudhammā ca, sattamī saṅghadāyikā

note.original: na catthi te dutiyā vaṇṇadhātu (sī. pī. ka.)
na māra bhāyāmi tavekikāpi (sī. ka.) … tamekikāsiṃ (pī.)
note.snippet: Lomaṃ na iñje na sampavedhe, kiṃ me tuvaṃ māra karissaseko
